newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Smith Barney starts Etec Systems.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Smith Barney starts Etec Systems.

text.p: -- Smith Barney confirmed Tuesday it had initiated coverage of Etec Systems Inc with a buy rating.
-- Additional details were not immediately available.
-- Etec gained 3/4 to 37-7/8 in early morning trading.
-- Smith Barney said the semiconductor industry is expected to double to up to $300 bilion by the year 2000. Etec is the leading supplier of "mask pattern generation" equipment to the chip industry.
-- Smith Barney sees Etec as a technology-drive company, which should be immune to current spending softness.
-- "We recommend this stock to long-term investors that have a high tolerance for short-term volatility," Smith Barney said in a research report.
